content.question: Which of the following statements is true?

choices.label: origin is an instance of the OrderedPair class.
origin is an instance of two double objects.
OrderedPair is an instance of the origin object.
printXY is an instance of the OrderedPair class.

content.answer: origin is an instance of the OrderedPair class.

skill.text: 4.A: Describe the behavior of a code segment or program.
